name: Strategic Hand
description:
This unit may choose to disallow its @{const}{sbac}{SBACs} from activating before their next combat this turn. If they choose to do so and a SBAC would have activated, this unit gains @{condition}{Ace in the Hole}{[Ace in the Hole]}.

Cannot be equipped with another “Hand” ability.

modifiers.trigger: bothif item|type|faith or arts|type|faith then 20 else 0 end

comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
